overview_of_class: Ballet II is a techniques class, involving barre work, centre work, adagio, pirouettes, petite allegro and grand allegro. Moving from the inside out, this class will follow a somatic approach to healthful, stable free, and musical dance. Readings from INSIDE BALLET TECHNIQUE, writing a 2 - 3 page paper, and terminology quiz will comprise the academic portion of the class.
name: Ballet II
title: SoC DANCE 270-0-20 Ballet II
